column2:
he marveled. It was the strangest time he'd seen in his entire life.
"I apologize that the room is so messy
column3:
Lalitha said.
I like it. I love how you are. Are you hungry? I'm a little hungry."
"No
column4:
Walter." She smiled. "I'm not hungry. But I can get you something."
"I was thinking
column6: a glass of soy milk. Soy beverage."

column2: did an about-turn and came back to me. The flare spluttered and faded
column3: and now the glare of the spotlight blinded me. I sat very still. It was 2.17. Against the noise of the blades a deeper resonant sound bit into the chill black air.
